SQLFunctionSpec.Name: Get interaction attribute ID field name
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get interaction attribute ID field name based on attribute category
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Bill Elfstrom
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_GETATTRIBUTEIDFIELDNAME(@ATTRIBUTECATEGORYID uniqueidentifier) returns nvarchar(100) with execute as caller as begin
declare @RETURNED_ID_VALUE as nvarchar(13) declare @DATATYPE as tinyint
declare @DATATYPE_TEXT tinyint = 0 declare @DATATYPE_NUMERIC tinyint = 1 declare @DATATYPE_DATE tinyint = 2 declare @DATATYPE_MONEY tinyint = 3 declare @DATATYPE_BOOLEAN tinyint = 4
set @DATATYPE = (select DATATYPECODE from ATTRIBUTECATEGORY where ID = @ATTRIBUTECATEGORYID)
if @DATATYPE = @DATATYPE_TEXT or @DATATYPE = @DATATYPE_NUMERIC set @RETURNED_ID_VALUE = 'ID' else if @DATATYPE = @DATATYPE_DATE or @DATATYPE = @DATATYPE_MONEY or @DATATYPE = @DATATYPE_BOOLEAN set @RETURNED_ID_VALUE = 'INTERACTIONID' else -- unknown set @RETURNED_ID_VALUE = null
return @RETURNED_ID_VALUE
end
